name: Fabryka Budowy Yachts i Długich Wodnych
description: Fabryka Budowy Yachts i Długich Wodnych (FBYDW) specializes in the design and construction of luxury yachts and high-performance vessels. Established in 1998, the company has rapidly gained a reputation for combining traditional craftsmanship with modern technology to produce some of the most sought-after yachts in the world. FBYDW operates out of its state-of-the-art facility located on the picturesque coastline, which allows for easy access to both fresh and saltwater for testing its vessels. The company's mission is to deliver unparalleled quality and innovation in every project, catering to clients who demand the best in marine luxury. FBYDW offers a range of services, including custom yacht design, interior outfitting, and comprehensive after-sales support. The company's portfolio includes a variety of yacht types, from sleek motor yachts to elegant sailing vessels, each tailored to meet the specific needs and desires of its clientele. With a strong commitment to sustainability, FBYDW is also exploring eco-friendly technologies and materials to minimize the environmental impact of its vessels. As it looks to the future, FBYDW aims to expand its presence in international markets while maintaining its focus on quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction.

seo.meta_title: Fabryka Budowy Yachts i Długich Wodnych | Luxury Yacht Manufacturer
seo.meta_description: Explore Fabryka Budowy Yachts i Długich Wodnych, a premier manufacturer of luxury yachts and high-performance vessels, known for quality craftsmanship and innovation.

faq.question: What does FBYDW specialize in?
faq.answer: FBYDW specializes in the design and construction of luxury yachts and high-performance vessels.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of FBYDW?
faq.answer: Jan Kowalski is the CEO of Fabryka Budowy Yachts i Długich Wodnych.

faq.question: Where is FBYDW headquartered?
faq.answer: FBYDW is headquartered in Gdańsk, Poland.

faq.question: What types of products does FBYDW offer?
faq.answer: FBYDW offers luxury motor yachts, sailing yachts, custom yacht design, interior outfitting, and after-sales support.
